name: Tower of Ellyandher
description:
"In the abandoned lands of Dhul Enadriel, a tall tower was built long ago by a powerful wizard named Ellyandher. The reason for its construction has already been forgotten. Some say that it keeps a rich treasure, others that it apprehends a beautiful maiden who was bewitched by the magician. The fact is that until today nobody has discovered the secret of the tower, and there was also no one to return from there to say what was in it. Will you, the most shrewd and skilled of the rogues and thieves, be able to unravel the challenges and pitfalls of the tower of Ellyandher and unveil its secret? "

The first commercial project of TerereZero Game Studio, made with love, only by 1 person!

I really hope you like it !

Follow  the studio through the web!
